--0-285752414-1050362242=:4911
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw looks at the stunning femme. He was right, something bad had happened in her past, and had cause her to cut off her emotions.

SharpClaw: You opened your spark up to someone and it ended badly, maybe tragicaly right? How about you tell me what happened exactly. It may do you good to talk about it. And let me tell you something. Living by our emotions isn't a mistake. Sure it may sometimes lead us into trouble, but it also can do good. It's the only way to truely live, to feel alive. Mistakes are ment to teach you lessons for the future.

SharpClaw's hand had moved to hers, taking hers in his.

OOC: Hmm since the restart, all the DrillBit/KitKat stuff didn't happen in this NBW. I'd really like to use that history and elaborate on it, but it really doesn't make any since...


raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:OOC:: How'd ya guess?

KitKat::
She looked at him, her face still blank. "I have no need for emotion. 
Not any more. All that I knew is gone and all those I knew are gone."
She turned away from him, remembering her old friends and comrads. 
She thought of Drillbit and how his life was terminated. She frowned 
and lowered her head a moment, wishing things had turned out 
different. 
She looked back at Drillbit. "The past is behind me and all I have 
left is the future. I do not wish to make the same mistakes again."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw senses how uneasy KitKat is. Maybe she would relax a bit 
with the energin. He took a sip of his.
> 
> SharpClaw: If you dont mind me asking, why do you try to remain so 
emotionless? I can understand it in battle, but why when you are 
among friends? Has there been something bad in your past?
> 
> OOC: Outch, burning the the DrillBit/KitKat relationship now, Logo? 
Hehe.
>
